title: Emmie Appl
text:
Hello there! I am a Pomona College class of 2025 Molecular Biology major and Japanese minor. Currently, I am working as an undergraduate researcher in the Liu Lab studying mannitol-driven biofilm formation in Vibrio cholerae. Outside of the lab, I am a captain for the Pomona-Pitzer Swimming & Diving team.

1 + 1

title: Cheese
text:
Show the code
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2024-02-13')


---- Compiling #TidyTuesday Information for 2024-02-13 ----
--- There are 3 files available ---


── Downloading files ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

  1 of 3: "historical_spending.csv"
  2 of 3: "gifts_age.csv"
  3 of 3: "gifts_gender.csv"


Show the code
library(ggplot2)




Show the code
historical_spending <- tuesdata$historical_spending

ggplot(historical_spending, aes(x = Year, y = PerPerson)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(
    x = "Year",
    y = "Average Money Spent per Person ($)"
  )
